exercises.name: Barbell Bench Press
exercises.notes: Focus on controlled eccentric. Leave 1-2 reps in the tank.

exercises.name: Incline Dumbbell Press
exercises.notes: Control the descent and squeeze the chest at the top.

exercises.name: Weighted Pull-ups (or Lat Pulldown if maxing out reps)
exercises.notes: Use weight belt if possible. Full stretch at the bottom.

exercises.name: Barbell Bent-Over Row
exercises.notes: Maintain strict back posture. Pull towards the lower abdomen.

exercises.name: Cable Overhead Triceps Extension
exercises.notes: Focus on the long head stretch. Keep elbows stationary.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Hammer Curls
exercises.notes: Focus on contracting the brachialis and brachioradialis.

exercises.name: High-Bar Barbell Squat
exercises.notes: Deep squat depth for maximal quad activation. Controlled descent.

exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.notes: Use a high foot placement for more quad emphasis. Aggressive pump.

exercises.name: Romanian Deadlift (RDL)
exercises.notes: Focus on hamstring stretch. Only lower until tension is maximized.

exercises.name: Leg Extension (Drop Set)
exercises.notes: Perform a drop set on the final set (reduce weight 30%, max reps).

exercises.name: Seated Calf Raise
exercises.notes: Full stretch at the bottom, squeeze at the top.

exercises.name: Seated Dumbbell Overhead Press
exercises.notes: Use full range of motion. Brace core strongly.

exercises.name: Neutral Grip Cable Row
exercises.notes: Focus on rowing with the elbows, squeezing shoulder blades together.

exercises.name: V-Bar Pulldown (Close Grip)
exercises.notes: Emphasize lat contraction and stretch.

exercises.name: Chest Dips (Forward Lean)
exercises.notes: If necessary, add weight. Lean forward to target the chest.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Lateral Raise (Superset)
exercises.notes: Strict form, raise weight slightly above parallel. Superset with Face Pulls.

exercises.name: Cable Face Pulls (Superset)
exercises.notes: Focus on external rotation and rear delt contraction. Superset with Lateral Raises.

days.day: Day 4: Lower Body B (Hamstring/Glute Bias & Core)

exercises.name: Conventional Deadlifts (or Trap Bar if preferred)
exercises.notes: Focus on maximal tension and explosive lockout. Use moderate RPE.

exercises.name: Bulgarian Split Squats (Dumbbell)
exercises.notes: Control the negative. Focus on depth and stability.

exercises.name: Lying Hamstring Curls
exercises.notes: Hold the peak contraction for 1 second on each rep.

exercises.name: Glute-Ham Raise (GHR) or Reverse Hyperextension
exercises.notes: If GHR is too difficult, substitute with weighted hyperextensions focusing on glutes/hams.

exercises.name: Hanging Leg Raises (Straight Leg)
exercises.notes: Focus on lower abdominal engagement. Use straps if grip is limiting.
